review: This thing is everything I thought it would be, I bought to add a TV in the house since I cut the cord but I like it so much I am going to get another to replace my old Roku.
author: Eddie Haskell

review: Couldn't keep this connected to my internet even though no other devices in my house had any problems at all. Tried resetting it and unplugging etc-still not able to recognize or connect after the first day. Loved what I saw before it stopped working and was very excited to use it. Now it is just setting on a shelf collecting dust...😒
author: MR

review: Selections based on viewing history are questionable,  hopefully they will improve with more use
author: Sam Blase

review: Amazing Amazon Fire TV Stick...Although 2 things gave me some problems. 1) For some reason, it didn't plug in easily into the HDMI port (Might have been the TV itself. 2) My wife is not technically inclined and she's had problems with it... (Wifey's problem, not Amazon...Overall, I like it and will continue to help the Warden...
author: Rudy Azcona

review: I might of missed something when I purchased it but you can only use the ESPN and showtime apps if you have the cable channels? If I have the channels why would I need a fire stick why wouldn't I just watch the channels!!! Doesn't make much sense
author: jeffrey

review: Excellent!  Easy set up & does exactly as I wanted
author: Lea Moore
